div.h1: Welcome to Hillsborough City School District

p.span: HCSD is a leader in educating the whole child in responsive, innovative, learning environments where all students and educators are engaged, empowered and continually striving to reach their potential.

span.a: School Closure - Order from County Health Office
School Closure - Order from County Health Office
School Closure - Order from County Health Office
School Closure - Order from County Health Office
School Closure - Order from County Health Office
School Closure - Order from County Health Office
Early Dismissal/ K-2 1:15 PM/ 3-5 1:30 PM/ 6-8 2:15 PM

img.alt: Public Engagement Accommodations for the April 22, 2020 School Board Meeting

a.span: Public Engagement Accommodations for the April 22, 2020 School Board Meeting

div.p: In light of the current Public Health Emergency, the Board of Trustees is holding its April 22nd meeting by teleconference. Refer to the link within the announcement for more information on the agenda, or instruction on how to participate in the teleconference.

a.title: Go to comments for Public Engagement Accommodations for the April 22, 2020 School Board Meeting

img.alt: Common Sense Media Parent Tip of the Week

a.span: Common Sense Media Parent Tip of the Week

div.p: Weekly parent tips provided through our partnership with Common Sense Media.

a.title: Go to comments for Common Sense Media Parent Tip of the Week

div.p: The HCSD Board of Trustees approved the 2020-2021 Academic Calendar at the February 12th Board Meeting. The approved calendar is available here.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 Academic Calendar
